title: The First Thanksgiving
description: This nonfiction Step 3 Step into Reading title is the perfect story for your developing reader!History comes to life on the page as readers learn the story of the Pilgrims hosting the first Thanksgiving.Â  Vividly retold in simple language for beginning readers, this book is ideal for 1st to 3rd grade readers!Step 3 Readers feature engaging characters in easy-to-follow plots about popular topics. For children who are ready to read on their own.
author: Linda Hayward
